text: Privacy Policy in Xianyu Community
Update date: June 29, 2022
【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, the service provider (or "us", see Appendix: Related Definition) to formulate this "Leisure Fish Community Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy"/"this privacy policy") to help you fully understandIn the process of using our products and services, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make a better choice.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses of the line identification of the lines under the body to ensure that you fully understand and agree before you start using it.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that this policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not meanThe opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You agree that this policy indicates that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information, and give the corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not meanUse your consent separately.

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application

This policy is applicable to the various products and services provided by you with new forms (collectively referred to as the "Leisure Fish Community") to you with the development of the leisure fish community website, client, applet, and new forms.

In addition to the relevant information collection and use activities described by this policy, this policy is not applicable to other services you provided by the idle fish community and other third directions. Other services are suitable for the personal information collection and use rules it explained to you.
2. Information collection and use
When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.

If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.
The specific feature scenarios we will provide you include::
(1) Help you become our user and account management
1. Basic user service
You need to complete the free fish community account login to use the complete service. If you do not complete your account login, you will only use browsing and search services.
2. Additional user service
Special user equity: If you choose to fill in gender, date of birth, place of residence, nickname, avatar, we can provide you with membership privilege services.
Among them, the nicknames and avatars you set will be displayed publicly.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: The nicknames and avatars you set will be displayed publicly.

text: Real name/actual authentication: If there is a scene of the real identity of the user in accordance with the law (including the release of idle items, purchase specific products or become other certified members, protect the rights and interests of minors in accordance with the law, combat telecommunications network fraud, and deduct you for youTaxes and fees, administrative law enforcement or relevant subjects in the relevant subjects), we will ask you to provide you with your true identity information (ID information and/or facial information) and/or corporate related information to complete the real -name certification.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If there is a scene of the user's true identity in accordance with the law, we will ask you to provide you with your true identity information (ID information and/or facial information) and/or corporate related information to complete the real -name authentication.

text: In order to achieve the purpose of certification, you need to actively provide relevant real identity information (name, document number and other documents or facial recognition information, which may be different according to the actual situation, subject to page prompts) and authorize us to pass the national authority and credible identity certificationThe institution conducts information verification;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to achieve the purpose of certification, you need to actively provide relevant authentic identity information and authorize us to conduct information verification through national authoritative identity authentication agencies.

text: Or you authorize us to obtain your necessary authentication identity information for your Binding Alipay account from Alipay.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We will record, save certification information and certification results in accordance with the law. This information is for the completion of certification purposes, or the purpose stipulated in other laws and regulations, and will not be used as other purposes without your explicit authorization.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will record, save certification information and certification results in accordance with the law. This information is for the completion of certification purposes, or the purpose stipulated in other laws and regulations, and will not be used as other purposes without your explicit authorization.

text: In addition, in order to ensure the safe operation of the functions of community functions such as the use of the idle fish community, participating in promotional activities, or user interaction, we need to check the real -name authentication status of the Alipay account binding to Alipay to verify your basic participationConditions to ensure your activity experience.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need to check the real -name authentication status of the Alipay account you binding to Alipay to verify your basic participation conditions to ensure your activities.

text: Authorized login: We may provide your account information (avatar, nickname, and other pages prompt information) to third parties after you agree with you alone, so that you can easily implement the registration or login of a third -party account in order to use the idle fish community in the idle fish communityThe services you provide in the third direction.

First Party Collection Information

text: In addition, we may obtain your third -party account information from a third party based on your separate consent and bind it with your idle fish community account, so that you can log in to the third party and use our products and//Or service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may obtain your third -party account information from a third party based on your individual consent.

text: We will use your relevant information within the scope of the authorization you agree with.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will use your relevant information within the scope of the authorization you agree with.

text: (2) Show you product or service information to you

In order to show you the product or service information, including your access footprint and historical search situation, we will collect and use your browsing and search records when you visit or use the idle fish community website or client.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect and search and search for your browsing and search records when you visit or use the idle fish community website or client.

text: Sorting services or other information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will combine equipment information, service log information collected in accordance with the law, and other information that get your authorization to predict your preference characteristics through algorithm models.

text: In order to meet your diverse needs, we will introduce diversified recommendation technologies during the sorting process, expand the recommended content, and avoid excessive concentration of the same type of content.

We will also push you a business advertisement and other information that you may be interested in based on your preference characteristics based on your preferences (some products/services that are applicable to this policy do not involve personalized information display based on personal characteristics), or send you to youBusiness short information.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will also push you a business advertisement and other information that you may be interested in based on your preferences, or send you commercial short information to you.

text: At the same time, we strive to ensure your privacy experience through the following measures:
1. If you want to delete your browsing and search records, you can choose to delete in "Search Box-History Search";
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: If you want to delete your browsing and search records, you can choose to delete in "Search Box-History Search".

text: 2. If you don't want to accept the business information we send to you, you can reply or close the withdrawal or other ways we provided by the SMS prompt;

3. If you need to check the sorting of your personal characteristics when using the search service you provided by us, you can click the corresponding button on the search results page to select the "credit", "price", "region", "" region ","Setting "General Sorting" and other settings;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If you use the search service you provide, you need to check the sorting of your personal characteristics. You can click the corresponding button and set it on the search results page.

text: 4. If you don't want to see the products or services recommended for you on the homepage or enter the payment page, you can select the product or service picture of the recommended product or service, select a shielding similar product or in the subsequent pop -up window according to the prompt or the prompts or similar products or similar products or similar products or in the prompts.Categories of goods or services;
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: If you don't want to see the products or services recommended for you on your homepage or enter the payment completion page, you can choose the recommended product or service picture of the recommended product or service, and select a similar product or product or product or product or product or product or product or product or product in the subsequent pop -up window.The category of service.

text: You can set up in "My-Settings-Privacy-Personalized Content Recommendation".
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can set up in "My-Settings-Privacy-Personalized Content Recommendation".

text: (3) Provide you with the functions of collection, purchase, attention and sharing

In the process of visiting our website or client, you can choose to collect the products and/or services that are interested in, establish a attention relationship with the seller/other members you are interested in, and share the products from the third party through the functional components provided by us./Service Information.

In the process of using the above features, we will collect service log information including your collection records, concerns, and sharing history to achieve the above functions and other purposes we have clearly notified.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect service log information including your collection records, concerns, and sharing history to achieve the above functions and the purpose we have clearly notified.

text: You can view or manage your collection information in "My-Collection".
(4) Help you complete the order and order management
When you order specific products and/or services in our products and/or services, we will generate orders for you to buy the product and/or service for you through the system.

In the process of ordering, you need to provide at least your consignee's name, delivery address, and consignee contact phone number. For some special types of goods and services, you also need to provide other information necessary for the product or service, such as involving it involvedYou need to provide your identity information during cross -border transactions to complete customs clearance.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You need to provide at least your consignee's name, the receiving address, and the telephone number of the consignee. For some special types of goods and services, you also need to provide other information necessary for the product or service.

text: At the same time, this order will contain the goods and/or service information you purchased, the specific order number, the time of order creation, the amount you should pay, your remarks information.

We collect this information to help you successfully complete the transaction, ensure your transaction security, facilitate your inquiry of order information, provide customer service and after -sales service and other purposes that we clearly notify.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We collect this information to help you successfully complete the transaction, ensure your transaction security, facilitate your inquiry of order information, provide customer service and after -sales service and other purposes that we clearly notify.

text: You can order goods and/or services for others through the idle fish community. You need to provide the aforementioned personal information of the actual consignee and ensure that the actual consignee has obtained the consent of the actual consignee.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can order goods and/or services for others through the idle fish community. You need to provide the aforementioned personal information of the actual consignee and ensure that the actual consignee has obtained the consent of the actual consignee.

text: To facilitate your understanding, query order information and manage order information, we will collect the order information you generated during our service process to display and facilitate the management of your order.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect the order information you generated during the use of our service to show you and facilitate the management of your order.

text: You can fill in/select more additional information including other contact calls and receipt time to ensure the accurate delivery of goods or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can fill in/select more additional information including other contact calls and receipt time to ensure the accurate delivery of goods or services.

text: You can check and manage your order information through "I bought" and "I sold".
(5) Help you complete the payment
To complete the order payment, you need to bind the Alipay account and choose the payment method.

In order to match the information matching and completion of the information between the idle fish community account and the Alipay account, Alipay will provide us with your Alipay user number and account type. We will provide Alipay with the corresponding idle fish community account ID and membership name.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Alipay will provide us with your Alipay user number and account type. We will provide Alipay with the corresponding idle fish community account ID and membership name.

text: We will develop your account member name, the corresponding Alipay account member name, order payment related information, order security related equipment information, and other necessary information required by other anti -money laundering laws through the Alipay software tools embedded in the website or client (Software tool development packages are referred to as "SDK" in this policy) and other security methods shared with Alipay.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We will share your account membership name, corresponding Alipay account member name, order payment related information, order security related equipment information, and other necessary information required by other anti -money laundering laws to develop packages and other security methods with Alipay.

text: If you choose to provide you with a payment service by other financial institutions, we will also share your bank card payment, which is valid for the bank card, and share the necessary information of bank card payment with the corresponding financial institutions you choose.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: If you choose to provide you with a payment service by other financial institutions, we will also share your bank card payment, which is valid for the bank card, and share the necessary information of bank card payment with the corresponding financial institutions you choose.

text: In order to allow us to learn and confirm your payment progress and status in a timely manner, and to provide you with service after -sales and dispute solutions, you agree that we can collect the transaction objects, Alipay or other financial institutions you choose.information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You agree that we can collect and pay the progress related information from the transaction objects you choose, Alipay or other financial institutions you choose.

text: You can view the Alipay account desensitization login information or application for your account or apply for replacing the bound Alipay account.
(6) Help you complete the delivery of goods or services

In order to ensure that the goods and/or services you buy can be smooth, safe, and accurately provide, we will disclose delivery information related to the order of Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. to provide logistics information systems and technical services to the idle fish community.It also synchronizes related distribution information to the corresponding logistics distribution subject according to the choice of the main body of the goods and/or the service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will disclose the delivery information related to order to Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd., which provides logistics information systems and technical services to the idle fish community, and synchronize related to the corresponding logistics distribution subject according to the choice of the product and/or service subject according to the product and/or service subject.Delivery Information.

text: You know and agree that the corresponding logistics distribution subject will inevitably know and use your delivery information to complete the delivery purpose.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You know and agree that the corresponding logistics distribution subject will inevitably know and use your delivery information to complete the delivery purpose.

text: In order to provide you with the purpose of after -sales and dispute solutions, we need to learn and confirm the delivery progress and status in a timely manner. You agree that we can collect information related to the delivery progress related to the main body of logistics.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need to learn and confirm the delivery progress and status in a timely manner. You agree that we can collect information related to the delivery progress related to the main body of the logistics.

text: (7) Customer service and dispute handling

When you contact us or propose the application for sale, after -sales, and dispute dispute handling, in order to ensure your account and system security, we need you to provide the necessary personal information to verify your membership status.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need you to provide the necessary personal information to verify your membership.

text: In order to facilitate the processing plan and results of helping you solve the problem or record related issues as soon as possible, we may preserve your communication, communication/call records and related content (including account information, order information, to prove the relevant related to related related to the relevantOther information provided by the facts, or the contact information you leave).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may preserve your communication, communication/call records and related content (including account information, order information, other information provided by the relevant facts, or the contact information you leave).

Usage

label: Important
Usage

text: (8) Provide you with information disclosure release function

You can select the message, comment and other information release functions that we provide for you, choose to publicly publish graphic/video content, publish messages, evaluation and Q & A content, one -click to resold the products purchased from Taobao platforms, and publish products as sellers as sellersAnd/or service related information, store -related information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: We respect and protect your settings of the relevant information and the scope of the release.
We may judge whether you can enjoy the corresponding information release function permissions based on your user type and network log information.

Please note that the information you publish may involve your or other people's personal information and even sensitive personal information. If you choose to upload pictures containing personal information when evaluating.
Please consider whether to share or even publicly share relevant information when using our services.
If you involve the personal information of others in your public release, you need to obtain the consent of others before the release.
(9) Provide you with security

In order to fulfill the legal obligations to ensure the security of transactions, improve the security of your use of us and our affiliates and partners, protect the safety of your or other users or the public, and better prevent fishing websites, fraud, fraud, andNetwork vulnerabilities, computer viruses, network attacks, network invasion risks, and more accurately identify the cases of violating laws and regulations or related agreements and rules of the idle fish community., Service log information, and may use or integrate your membership information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and information that our affiliated companies and partners obtain your authorization or sharing according to law (Among them, we may run in the background of the application background.During the period, collect MAC addresses, IMEI, and other device identifiers for risk verification) to comprehensively judge your account and transaction risk, conduct authentication, test and prevent security incidents, and take necessary records, audit, analysis, and disposal measures in accordance with the law.
label: Data Security
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In the application, we embed the application security SDK developed by our affiliated company to collect your equipment information and service log information, and may use or integrate your membership information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and our affiliated companies and partners and partnersObtain information on your authorization or sharing according to law.

text: (10) Other additional services provided for you
1. Additional services based on system permissions

To provide you with more convenient, better, personalized products and/or services, and strive to improve your experience, we may collect and use your personal information by opening system permissions in the following additional services.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information

Important

Edit/Control

Once you turn off the right of power, it means that you cancel the authorization.With relevant personal information, you cannot continue to provide you with the service corresponding to the permissions.

Edit/Control

Once you turn off the power, it means that you cancel the authorization. We will no longer continue to collect and use relevant individuals based on the corresponding authority.Information cannot continue to provide you with the service corresponding to the permissions.

Risk

text: 2. Cookie and services of similar technologies
Cookie and similar device information identification technology are commonly used in the Internet.

When you use our service, we may use related technologies to send one or more cookies or anonymous identifiers (hereinafter referred to as "Cookie") to your device to collect, identify and store your access, and use this product to use this product.information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may use related technologies to send one or more cookie or anonymous identifiers (hereinafter referred to as "Cookie") to your device to collect, identify and store your information when you access and use this product.

text: We promise that cookies will not be used for any other purposes other than the purpose of this privacy policy.

We use Cookie to ensure the safety and efficient operation of products and services. It can make us confirm the security status of your account and transaction, check the related abnormal conditions of collapse and delay, and help you save the steps of filling in your form and entering search content.And process.
At the same time, we may use Cookie to show you the information or functions you may be interested in and optimize your choice of advertising.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may use Cookie to show you the information or functions you may be interested in and optimize your choice of advertising.

text: Most browsers provide users with the function of removing the browser cache data. You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of cookies or reject our cookies.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of Cookie or reject our cookies.

text: You may not be able to use services or corresponding functions that depend on cookies because of these modifications.

text: 3. Under the premise of strictly identifying and unable to re -identify specific individuals through security encryption technology, we will use the collected data for machine learning, algorithm model training or other data analysis and mining processing to better guaranteeOur product experience and auxiliary business decision analysis.

Usage

text: 3. Provide information to the outside world
(1) Sharing
We will not share your personal information with companies, organizations, and individuals other than the service provider of Xianyu Community, except the following situations:

Important
Risk

Perform the sharing necessary for the legal obligations: we may share your personal information in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, litigation, and disputes in accordance with the requirements of administrative and judicial organs in accordance with the requirements of administrative and judicial organs in accordance with the law, and other legal obligations.

Important
Risk

(3) Storage safety
1. Data protection technical measures

We have adopted our information that meets industry standards, reasonable and feasible security measures to protect your information, and prevent personal information from being disclosed, used, modified, damaged or lost by unauthorized access, publicly disclosed, used, modified, damaged, or lost.

text: 3. Response of personal information security incident

If our physical, technical, or management protection facilities are damaged, and the information is caused by unauthorized access, public disclosure, tampering or destruction, and damage to your legitimate rights and interests, we will launch an emergency plan in time and take reasonable and necessary measures.In order to reduce the impact on your personal.

text: 4. Prevention of account security risk

When using the idle fish community service for online transactions, you inevitably disclose your personal information from the other party or the potential transaction of the transaction, such as contact or contact address.
In addition, you can also establish communication, exchange information or analysis content with our services.

Please protect your personal information properly, provides others only under the necessary circumstances, and do not trust the transaction through other trading tools to avoid the stolen information or even encounter telecommunications network fraud.

If you are worried about your personal information, especially your account or password, please contact our customer service immediately so that we can take corresponding measures based on your application.

You can also independently perform "account security", "account maintenance" and "device management" in "My-Settings-Security Center-Account Security", and submit fraud money in "My-Settings-Security Center-Report Center"Complaints and reports of information leakage and sale of banned products.
label: Edit/Control

text: 6. Policy update

But without your clear consent, we will not limit your rights you enjoy in accordance with this policy.
